en: When applied to Monte Mario datum, this projection emulates superseded CRS ED50 / UTMA in which FE=500000m and FN=-4000000m exactly. This projection's FE and FN values include approximations for the transformation from Monte Mario to ED50.

{'$schema':'https://proj.org/schemas/v0.7/projjson.schema.json','type':'Conversion','name':'TM Emilia-Romagna','method':{'name':'Transverse Mercator','id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':9807}},'parameters':[{'name':'Latitude of natural origin','value':0,'unit':'degree','id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':8801}},{'name':'Longitude of natural origin','value':9,'unit':'degree','id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':8802}},{'name':'Scale factor at natural origin','value':0.9996,'unit':'unity','id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':8805}},{'name':'False easting','value':500053,'unit':'metre','id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':8806}},{'name':'False northing','value':-3999820,'unit':'metre','id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':8807}}],'id':{'authority':'EPSG','code':5658}}

CONVERSION['TM Emilia-Romagna',METHOD['Transverse Mercator',ID['EPSG',9807]],PARAMETER['Latitude of natural origin',0,ANGLEUNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433],ID['EPSG',8801]],PARAMETER['Longitude of natural origin',9,ANGLEUNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433],ID['EPSG',8802]],PARAMETER['Scale factor at natural origin',0.9996,SCALEUNIT['unity',1],ID['EPSG',8805]],PARAMETER['False easting',500053,LENGTHUNIT['metre',1],ID['EPSG',8806]],PARAMETER['False northing',-3999820,LENGTHUNIT['metre',1],ID['EPSG',8807]],ID['EPSG',5658]]

{'http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#comment': "When applied to Monte Mario datum, this projection emulates superseded CRS ED50 / UTMA in which FE=500000m and FN=-4000000m exactly. This projection's FE and FN values include approximations for the transformation from Monte Mario to ED50."}
